select-user-type.who_you_are: Was du bist? (W√§hle jetzt aus, du kannst es sp√§ter √§ndern)
select-user-type.who_you_are_desc: At the very beginning user must select type, so we're asking if the user is taxi driver or passenger
select-user-type.driver_desc: User can be either taxi driver, or passenger. User selects this option at the very beginning.
select-user-type.passenger_desc: User can be either taxi driver, or passenger. User selects this option at the very beginning.
request-phone.type_your_phone: Bitte sende uns deine Telefonnummer. Wir geben diese Nummer nicht ohne Erlaubnis weiter.
request-phone.type_your_phone_desc: This message is displayed when we ask users to send their phone number before they can use our services.
request-phone.button_text_desc: Text on the button. When users click this button, their phone number will be sent to back to us.
request-phone.all_set: üëå Alles klar soweit, du kannst jetzt eine Fahrt bestellen!
request-phone.all_set_desc: We display this message when passenger done entering his phone number, and when all configuration is done, and when passenger can make an order.
passenger-index.choose_taxi_type: Welche Art von Taxi willst du?
passenger-index.choose_taxi_type_desc: We show this message on the passenger's main screen. We ask what type of taxi passenger wants: car or bike.
passenger-index.car_desc: We show this text on the button when passenger wants to select the car type of taxi s/he wants
passenger-index.motorbike_desc: We show this text on the button when passenger wants to select the bike type of taxi s/he wants. Cheaper shows that bike is often cheaper than a car.
passenger-index.s_desc: We show this text on the button on the main passenger's screen, when user clicks, s/he goes to settings.
passenger-index.error_only_known_type: Unbekannte Auswahl, bitte w√§hle das Zweirad, Auto oder die Einstellungen aus.
passenger-index.error_only_known_type_de: This is error message that is shown to the passenger when s/he picks the taxi type s/he want to order. We show this error when user somehow selected something different from bike or car.
passenger-request-location.provide_locat: Bitte teile deinen Standort, um Fahrer im Umkreis zu finden.
We show this message when we want the passenger to provide his/her location.
passenger-request-destination.provide_de: Wohin m√∂chtest du? Bitte gebe die genaue Adresse an (damit der GPS-Navigator es versteht) oder beschreibe den Ort.
Message is shown when we ask passenger to provide destination. It is NOT request for current location, it is destination - the place where passenger is going!
order-submitted.order_submitted: ‚è≥ Suche nach Fahrern... Wenn du eine Fahrt gefunden hast, klicke auf die Taste unten üëá
order-submitted.order_submitted_desc: We show this message when passenger submits order. This message is just to inform the user that order has been submitted, and we're looking for drivers.
order-submitted.cancel_desc: Text on the button. We show this button to user so s/he can finish searching for drivers. Tehnically, we're cancelling the order, but don't use the word "cancel" here.
order-submitted.error_incorrect_input: Unbekannte Auswahl, bitte versuche es erneut.
order-submitted.error_incorrect_input_de: Just error message. Displayed to the user when the order has been submitted and user selected/typed something else than "cancel".
order-cancelled.order_cancelled: üëå Danke, die Suche nach Fahrern wurde beendet.
order-cancelled.order_cancelled_desc: We show this message when passenger placed an order, and then clicked "Finish search" button. Technically, we're cancelling order, but don't use the word "cancel" here.
driver-select-vehicle-type.select: W√§hle den Fahrzeugtyp, den du als Taxi verwenden m√∂chtest.
driver-select-vehicle-type.select_desc: Asking the driver to provider vehicle type.
driver-select-vehicle-type.motorbike_des: We show this as text on the button when driver select motor bike as his type of vehicle.
driver-select-vehicle-type.car_desc: We show this as text on the button when driver select car as his type of vehicle.
driver-select-vehicle-type.error_only_kn: Unbekannte Auswahl, bitte w√§hle Auto oder Roller / Motorrad aus.

This is error message that is shown to the taxi driver when s/he tries to pick the vehicle type s/he wants to use for the taxi. We show this error when user somehow selected something different from scooter, bike or car.
driver-explain-checkins.text: Fast fertig, noch ein paar Dinge zur Beachtung. Telegramm hat keine Echtzeit-GPS-Standortunterst√ºtzung. Also jedes Mal, wenn du deinen Standort √§ndert, checke ein. Oder checke jede Stunde ein, wenn du bereit bist neue Auftr√§ge zu akzeptieren. Das wird uns helfen, Passagiere im Umkreis zu finden. Tippe "Weiter".
driver-explain-checkins.text_desc: Text for drivers explaining how check-ins work and why do we need them.
driver-explain-checkins.next_desc: Text for the button, on clicking next we'll jump to the next screen.
driver-request-location.provide_location: Bitte teile deinen Standort, damit Passagiere im Umkreis dich finden k√∂nnen.
We show this message when we want the driver to provide his/her location.
driver-explain-whats-next.text: Alles Klar! Du wirst √ºber Passagiere und Auftr√§ge im Umreis benachrichtigt. Halte diese App offen und checke jede Stunde ein, und wenn du deinen Standort √§nderst. Tippe "Weiter".
driver-explain-whats-next.text_desc: Explanation to the driver about next steps after providing all necessary information.
driver-explain-whats-next.next_desc: Text for the button, on clicking next we'll jump to the next screen.
driver-index.checkin_desc: Checkin button text. Used to to check-in and update driver's location.
driver-index.mute_desc: Mute (disable notifications) button text for drivers. Used to mute notifications about passengers around.
driver-index.unmute_desc: Unmute (enable notifications) button text for drivers. Used to unmute notifications about passengers around.
driver-index.unknown_choice: Unbekannte Auswahl, bitte versuche es erneut.
driver-index.unknown_choice_desc: When driver on the main screen selected something wrong we show this error message.
driver-mute.mute_ok: ‚ö†Ô∏è Beachte du Du KEINE Benachrichtigungen √ºber Passagiere im Umkreis erhalten wirst bis du die Stummschaltung aufhebst.
driver-mute.mute_ok_desc: We show this message to drivers when they click "Mute" button in driver index menu.
driver-unmute.unmute_ok: Du hast die Stimmschaltung aufgehoben und wirst Benachrichtigungen √ºber Passagiere im Umkreis erhalten. Vergesse nicht jede Stunde einzuchecken..
driver-unmute.unmute_ok_desc: We show this message to drivers when they click "Unmute" button in driver index menu.
driver-checkin.provide_location: Bitte teile deinen Standort, damit Passagiere im Umkreis dich finden k√∂nnen.
driver-checkin.provide_location_desc: We show this message to drivers when they check-in and we want them to provide current location.
driver-checkin.ok: üëå Danke f√ºr das Einchecken! Checke jede Stunde ein, und wenn du deinen Standort √§nderst! Bitte √ºberpr√ºfe den obigen Standort, ist er nicht korrekt, checke erneut ein und tippe auf B√ºroklammer-Standort (anstatt eine Taste zu  dr√ºcken).
driver-checkin.ok_desc: We show this message to drivers when they check-in.
driver-order-new.new_order_desc: We show this message to drivers when they receive new order.
driver-order-new.distance: Entfernung zum Passagier: ~%s. Standort Passagier (Zum Vergr√∂√üern klicken):
driver-order-new.distance_desc: We show this message to drivers when they receive new order.
driver-order-new.from_desc: We show this message to drivers when they receive new order.
driver-order-new.to_desc: We show this message to drivers when they receive new order. Here we show passenger's destination address and maybe some random details.
driver-order-new.price: Passagier ist bereit zu zahlen: % s (in lokaler W√§hrung)
driver-order-new.price_desc: We show this message to drivers when they receive new order. This is passenger's price for the order.
driver-order-new.call_to_action: Bitte w√§hle eine Aktion üëá oder ignoriere diese Mitteilung.
driver-order-new.call_to_action_desc: We show this message to drivers when they receive new order
driver-order-new.send_my_number_desc: We show this message to drivers as a text on the button when drivers receive new order. When driver clicks on this button, we send driver's phone number to passenger. Keep this text as short as possible.
driver-order-new.set_my_price_desc: We show this message to drivers as a text on the button when drivers receive new order. When driver clicks on this button, we redirect driver to the menu where s/he can set their own price. Keep this text as short as possible.
driver-order-new.price_not_set: Der Preis f√ºr diesen Auftrag wurde nicht vom Passagier festgelegt. Du musst deinen Preis angeben.
driver-order-new.price_not_set_desc: We show this message to drivers on new order when passenger doesn't know the price. In this case drivers must set their price.
metric-distance.km_desc: Metric distance in kilometers. For example: "10 km" is 10 kilometers.
passenger-request-price.set_price: In dieser App setzt der Fahrgast den Preis fest üòâ Gebe uns deinen Preis an (in lokaler W√§hrung). Wie viel bist du bereit zu zahlen? (Oder gebe "0" (Null) an, wenn du es nicht weisst)
passenger-request-price.set_price_desc: Here we ask passenger to set the price for the order. In our app passengers set the price for orders.
passenger-request-price.should_be_numeri: Hoppla, der Preis sollte der numerische Wert (und in lokaler W√§hrung) sein! Zum Beispiel: "50". Bitte versuche es erneut!
We show this error text to passenger when s/he entered the price for the order, but the value is not numeric.
passenger-request-price.on_timeout: Es scheint du wartest schon zu lange? Das tut uns leid. Wenn du keine Fahrt gefunden hast, empfehlen wir es sp√§ter erneut zu versuchen.
passenger-request-price.on_timeout_desc: We show this message when order was submitted and passenger is waiting for too long. We automatically finish search here.
passenger-contact-new-number.message: üîî {{driver}} akzeptiert deinen Preis! Entfernung zum Fahrer  ~{{distance}}. Rufe den Fahrer an um deinen Auftrag zu best√§tigen:
passenger-contact-new-number.message_des: Message we send to passengers when driver accepted their order price.
driver-order-set-price.set_price: Lege deinen Preis fest (in lokaler W√§hrung). Du kannst Details einf√ºgen, die deinen Preis erl√§utern. Zum Beispiel: "20, wegen der Br√ºckenreparatur" oder "15, wenn der Verkehr in Ordnung ist"
driver-order-set-price.set_price_desc: Here we tell drivers to set their own price for the order. We show this message when drivers click on "set price" button.
passenger-contact-driver-price.message: üîî ‚ö†Ô∏è {{driver}} bietet einen anderen Preis: "{{price}}". Entfernung zum Fahrer ~{{distance}}. Wenn du mit dem Preis einverstanden bist, rufe den Fahrer an um deinen Auftrag zu best√§tigen:
passenger-contact-driver-price.message_d: Message we send to passengers when driver offers his own price.
passenger-verify-location.verify_locatio: Bitte schaue in die Karte oben (zum Vergr√∂√üern klicken), ist dieser Standort korrekt?
Sometimes phones/devices don't provide correct GPS coordinates, so we have to ask users if location they sent on previous step is correct
passenger-verify-location.try_with_paper: Bitte versuche deine Standort zu senden durch Tippen auf die B√ºroklammer, und danach auf das Standort-Icon.
Here we ask users to try the different way of sending location. Instead of clicking the button, they can try to use Telegram menu.
passenger-verify-cash.verify_cash: Die meisten unserer Fahrer akzeptieren keine Kreditkarten. Haste du Bargeld?
passenger-verify-cash.verify_cash_desc: We display this message to passengers before they can place order. If they don't have cash, on the next step we'll ask them to get some cash.
passenger-verify-cash.get_some_cash: Leider musst du Bargeld haben, bevor du mitfahren kannst. Versuche es erneut wenn du Bargeld hast!
passenger-verify-cash.get_some_cash_desc: Here we ask users to try the different way of sending location. Instead of clicking the button, they can try to use Telegram menu.
driver-request-radius.request_radius: Bis zu welcher Entfernung vom Passagier bist du an Auftr√§gen interessiert? W√§hle von der Liste üëá or gebe eine Zahl ein (bis zu 10 km).
driver-request-radius.request_radius_des: Drivers should select the radius (from 1 to 10 km), so they can be informed about orders nearby. And "nearby" definition is always diffrent for each person. So we're letting them choose.
driver-request-radius.option1_desc: Represents the radius driver can use to define what means "nearby". It's just a text on the button. Omit miles while translating to other languages, it's required for English only.
driver-request-radius.option3_desc: Represents the radius driver can use to define what means "nearby". It's just a text on the button. Omit miles while translating to other languages, it's required for English only.
driver-request-radius.option5_desc: Represents the radius driver can use to define what means "nearby". It's just a text on the button. Omit miles while translating to other languages, it's required for English only.
driver-request-radius.should_be_valid: Kann deine Wahl nicht verstehen. W√§hle die Option üëá oder gebe eine Zahl von 1 bis 10 ein.
driver-request-radius.should_be_valid_de: We show this error message when we ask driver for radius and got something we don't understand.
global.location_button_text_desc: Text on the button when we ask user to provide location
global.default_options_message: Bitte w√§hle eine Aktion aus dem Men√º unten üëá
global.default_options_message_desc: Default message we show to users when they can pick action from the menu. Menu is always located below the message.
global.default_inline_options_message: Klicke aus die Taste üëá oder ignoriere diese Mitteilung.
global.default_inline_options_message_de: Default message we show to users when they can pick action from inline menu. Menu is always located below the message.
global.replied_to_order: ‚úîÔ∏è Du hast auf diesen ‚òùÔ∏è Auftrag geantwortet. Erwarte einen Anruf vom Passagier um zu best√§tigen.
global.replied_to_order_desc: We show this message to drivers when they replied to the order by clicking on inline button(s).
global.yes_desc: General text for "yes", usually used as button text.
global.no_desc: General text for "no", usually used as button text.
global.error_try_again: Hoppla, kann das nicht verstehen. Bitte versuche es erneut.
global.error_try_again_desc: General error message we show to our users.
global.error_location: Hoppla, kann diesen Standort nicht verstehen. Bitte klicke auf die Taste, oder verwende B√ºroklammer-Standort um deine GPS-Koordinaten zu senden.
global.error_location_desc: General error message for location errors. For example, when user tries to type address, but we expect coordinates.
global.driver_desc: Driver. Sometimes we just need to use the word "driver", so don't think about this too much ;)
global.phone_desc: Message to show phone number, translation is not required.
